rooms.description: A spacious living room with Art Deco style finishes including geometric patterns and contrasting colors. Large floor-to-ceiling windows are installed on the south-facing wall for ample natural light.
Modern kitchen with Art Deco accents. Equipped with state-of-the-art appliances and marble countertops.
The master bedroom featuring ample storage and built-in wardrobes. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide a serene view of the exterior.
A well-lit bathroom with modern fixtures and Art Deco style detailing.
A dedicated library space for a quiet reading area. Book shelves integrated with Art Deco detailing.
A small balcony overlooking the main living area. Equipped with outdoor seating and decorative elements.

openings.description: The main entrance door on the west side with Art Deco detailing.
Secondary exit leading to a service area.
Floor-to-ceiling window in the living room offering expansive views and natural light.
